overview: Angga and Vemmy are a husband and wife who have only been married for a year and have not been blessed with children. Vemmy is happy because they have just moved to a new house after previously living in the "hell of Pondok Mertua Indah". Even though he lives alone, Angga, who is basically a "mammy's boy", still cannot move on from his mother's "grip".
title: Pare
